meanings.definition: The act of making something larger or more extensive.
meanings.sent1: The enlargement of the garden allowed for more flowers to be planted.
meanings.sent2: The enlargement of the map helped us see more details of the area.
meanings.sent3: The enlargement of the cake made it impossible to fit candles on top.
meanings.sent4: The enlargement of the project brought new challenges to the team.
meanings.sent5: The enlargement of the screen made watching movies more enjoyable.

meanings.sent1: The room's enlargement made it feel more spacious.
meanings.sent2: The enlargement of the balloon showed it was ready to burst.
meanings.sent3: The enlargement of the cat's eyes in the dark was a bit scary.
meanings.sent4: The enlargement of the crowd indicated a successful event.
meanings.sent5: The enlargement of the smile on her face showed her happiness.

meanings.definition: An increase in size or scale.
meanings.sent1: The enlargement of the company led to more job opportunities.
meanings.sent2: The enlargement of the storm caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The enlargement of the ice cream scoop made it topple over.
meanings.sent4: The enlargement of the mountain in the distance was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The enlargement of the bookshelf accommodated more books.
